solution_line_template: One clerk can process {forms_per_hour_per_clerk} x {hours_in_day} = <<{forms_per_hour_per_clerk}*{hours_in_day}={forms_per_clerk_per_day}>>{forms_per_clerk_per_day} forms in a day.
To process the forms for that day {total_forms_needed}/{forms_per_clerk_per_day} = <<{total_forms_needed}/{forms_per_clerk_per_day}={clerks_needed}>>{clerks_needed} clerks must be hired.
